title: Google\Cloud\Monitoring\V3\UptimeCheckConfig\ContentMatcher
name: ContentMatcher
description:
Used to perform string matching. It allows substring and regular expressions, together with their negations.

Generated from protobuf message google.monitoring.v3.UptimeCheckConfig.ContentMatcher

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.content
params.description: String or regex content to match (max 1024 bytes)

params.name: data.matcher
params.description: The type of content matcher that will be applied to the server output, compared to the content string when the check is run.
